alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Genesee; Monroe; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 9:15PM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Mixed precipitation and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of one to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Monroe, Erie, Genesee, and Chautauqua counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. The combination of ice, snow, and rapidly falling temperatures will result in icy and snow covered roads. Snow will reduce visibility tonight. The snow will taper off early Friday morning, but roads may remain very slippery through the morning commute.
info.instruction: Periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will result in slippery roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow and ice reports through our website or social media.

area.areaDesc: Chautauqua; Genesee; Monroe; Northern Erie; Southern Erie
